description: View solar charging device status Unofficial status monitor for Midnite solar's Classic 150, 200, 250 Charge Controller. It is a Read Only Program, it does not write to the Classic. If the app detects a Whizbang Junior current monitor, the State Of Charge will display along with a bi-directional current gauge. Basic support for the Tristar MPPT charge controller from Morningstar is also included.
